Text:
This is a medium PVE AI expansion pack (must be used together with Enhanced AI_V2) 
 Public Part: 
 Starts in Imperial War Mode by default 
 The main town center has a Home Guardian effect 
 - Nearby units recover 1 HP per second and gain 20% damage increase 
 - Gain 20% attack speed increase 
 - Gain out-of-combat healing +6/s 
 Note: Only when the main town center is not destroyed!!!) 

 Resource Part: 
 Gold mine storage x2 
 Large stone mine storage x2.5 

 Defense Building Part: 
 Wall and stone gate health x 1.5, self-healing +25/s, construction time -2 s, stone gate construction time -5 s 
 Russian wooden wall health x2 and construction time -4 seconds 
 Mongols can build Russian wooden walls (half health and construction time -7 seconds) 
 Mongol relay network range +3 tiles 
 Stone wall towers, large arrow towers, and watchtowers have 1.5x health, each with defensive artillery features 
 - Crossbows are all replaced with catapults 
 - Castles come with 1 cannon upon completion 
 Mongol outposts have thicker health and can be upgraded to have two artillery platforms 
 Castle special changes: 
 Can be upgraded to gain 1 catapult platform and 1 cannon platform (crossbows replaced with catapults) 
 Unique: 
 China, Zhu Xi: Castles have 4 additional musket weapon slots (requires garrisoning) 
 Japan: Garrisoned shooting slots only have half, but gain an extra 2 rockets (total of 3) 
 Byzantine: Castles come with one catapult platform 
 France, Joan of Arc civilization: Red Palace has +1000 health 
 English civilization: Windsor Palace has +1000 health 
 Ottoman: Can be upgraded to add one more supergun 
 Russia: 
 - Wooden fortresses replace crossbows with heavy crossbows (true damage, 45) 
 - Kremlin replaces crossbows with 2 heavy crossbows (true damage, 45) 
 Spasskaya Tower has 4 cannons 
 Castle outpost weapon attack power bonuses: 
 Cannon +10(80), Ottoman supergun +12(112), boiling oil +10(40), catapult platform +2(9), fireworks platform +8(88), Russian heavy crossbow (true damage, 45) 

 Unit Part: 
 Villagers only occupy half the population (population = 0.5) 
 Villager resource gathering rate increased 
 Villager production time -5 seconds 

 Technology Part: 
 Town Center allows Emperor Era upgrade to Empire Rise technology (produces stone) 

 AI Enhancement Part: 
 Limits villagers to 60 population 
 Resource gathering speed: Ridiculous x1.5, Unreasonable x2, Absurd x3 
 AI is more inclined to fight to the end 

 This package is under long-term updates, with many contents still under research and experimentation 

 suggest:
1033498641@qq.com

- Imperial Palace 
- Jiangnan Tower 
- Guild Hall 
- The King's Palace 
- Meinwerk Palace 
- House of Wisdom
- The Golden Gate 
- Compound of the Defender 
- Istanbul Imperial Palace 
- Mansa Quarry 
- Grand Winery 
- Kura Storehouse
Nearby units gain Home Guard effect +%1%%% attack speed
Add a defensive mangonel emplacement to this structure
